channel.title: Parse incoming packets help
channel.description:
im trying to add talking (havent added case yet) but when i add parse incoming packets method and then this code
[CODE] public void showInterface(int interfaceid) { resetAction(); outStream.createFrame(97); outStream.writeWord(interfaceid); flushOutStream(); }[/CODE]
i keep getting this error
[CODE]client.java:41: cannot find symbol symbol : variable interfaceID location: class client interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); ^ client.java:45: cannot find symbol symbol : variable interfaceID location: class client + interfaceID + ", size=" + packetSize "]: ]" ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]

item.title: Parse incoming packets help
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[code][code]change

interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();

To
[/code]
int interfaceID = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
[/code]

Read full topic
